data.text: Jisas takaw olap agak, Nɨbop nɨŋɨd yɨbɨl agebin, bɨ chag sipsip wali ak kanɨbtub yɨpɨd gɨl mɨgan ak mɨdaknɨŋ, tam yepɨs olap talakɨl amnɨgab ak, bɨ kabɨyam tɨmel tap si dup ak nɨm anɨgɨnɨgab agak.
Bɨ wali kanɨbtub yɨpɨd gɨl mɨgan anep amnɨgab ak pen, ne bɨ chag sipsip mukep ak mɨdeb agak.

Pen bɨ anɨb ak amjakek, bɨ kanɨbtub kod mɨdep ak nop nɨŋɨd kanɨb yɨkɨnɨgab agak. Chag sipsip okok, bɨ anɨb ak meg mɨgan nop ak nɨgɨnɨgabal tek, kɨlop yɨb nokom nokom agɨlɨg, poŋɨd seŋayaŋ amnɨgab agak.
10.4 Jon 10.27 Chag sipsip ne mɨdupsek poŋɨd seŋayaŋ amɨl, ne ned gaknɨŋ, kɨli meg mɨgan nop ak nɨgɨnɨgabal anɨb ak tek, kɨdek gɨnɨgabal agak.
Pen bɨ olap nop ma nepal ak kɨdek ma gɨnɨgabal agak. Bɨ anɨb ak apɨl agek, meg mɨgan nop ak ma nɨgɨnɨgabal tek, pɨlɨk amnɨgabal agak.
10.6 Jon 16.25 Jisas anɨgɨl takaw paladaŋ lɨl agak ak pen, takaw agup adek ak agɨl ma tɨk nɨgɨlak.
Ma nɨgelak, Jisas tepayaŋ agak, Nɨbop nɨŋɨd yɨbɨl agebin, yad nɨm chag sipsip kanɨbtub ak mɨdebin agak.
10.8 Jer 23.1-2, Ese 34.2-3 Pen bɨ yɨp ned owlak okok, mɨdupsek bɨ tap si dɨpal ak nɨm, chag sipsip okok takaw kɨlop ak ma nɨgɨlak agak.

10.9 Sng 118.20, Jon 14.6, Epe 2.18 Yad nɨm kanɨbtub ak mɨdebin agak. Binɨb olap yɨp yɨl apɨl kanɨbtub mɨgan ak amek, God nop tɨg asɨk dɨnɨgab agak. Kanɨb anɨb ak mɨgan amɨlɨg seŋ apɨlɨg tap ñɨŋɨnɨgab agak.
Bɨ tap si dep ak, ne chag sipsip okok kɨlop si dɨnɨg, paklɨnɨg, gɨ tɨmel gɨnɨg nep owup agak. Tap olap ke gɨnɨg ma owup agak. Yad pen ownek ak, kɨm mɨdɨl mɨdtep yɨbɨl gɨnɨgel agɨl ownek agak.
Yad bɨ chag sipsip mukep tep yɨbɨl ak mɨdebin agak. Bɨ chag sipsip mukep tep yɨbɨl anɨb ak, chag sipsip okok kɨlop gɨñɨnɨg monmon kumnɨgayn agak.

10.12 Sek 11.16-17, Apo 20.29 Bɨ wog mani nep gɨlɨg chag sipsip kod yenɨgab ak, bɨ chag sipsip mukep yɨpɨd gɨl mel agak. Chag sipsip nap nɨb mel ak nɨm, ne chen ladek olap nɨŋɨd, chag sipsip okok kɨlop kelɨgɨl pɨlɨk amnɨgab agak. Amenɨgab nɨm, chen ladek ne chag sipsip okok kɨlop yuk dam kɨd keke yokɨnɨgab agak.
Bɨ anɨb ak wog mani nep dɨnɨg gɨnɨgab anɨb ak tek, anɨgɨl pɨlɨk amnɨgab agak. Chag sipsip okok kɨlop gos ma nɨgɨnɨgab agak.

Yad bɨ chag sipsip mukep tep yɨbɨl ak mɨdebin agak. Bapi chɨlapɨl penpen nɨgtep gɨpul tek, yad chag sipsip okok ayɨp penpen nɨgtep gɨpun agak. Anɨb ak chag sipsip okok kɨlop gɨñɨnɨg monmon kumnɨgayn agak.

10.16 Ais 56.8, Ese 34.23, 37.22-24, Jon 11.52, Epe 2.14, 1 Pi 2.25 Chag sipsip yad ogɨnap sek ak pen, kɨli wali mɨgan anɨb awl yɨl mel agak. Chag sipsip anɨb okok abe poŋɨd ownɨm agak. Pen kɨli takaw yad ak nɨgɨnɨgabal agak. Chag sipsip yɨp yɨl mel ak pen, apɨl jɨmñɨl mɨdɨl, bɨ mukep kɨli nokom olap nep mɨdɨl gɨnɨgab agak.
10.17 Ais 53.7-8, 53.12, Plp 2.8-9, Hib 2.9 Yad tepayaŋ tɨkjakɨnɨg, kumin agɨl gos nepin agak. Anɨgen, Bapi yɨp mapen yɨbɨl lup agak.

10.18 Jon 2.19, 5.26, 6.38, 14.31, 19.11, Apo 2.24, 2.32 Binɨb olap gos ne nɨŋɨd gek ma kumnɨgayn agak. Yad ke kumin agɨl kumnɨgayn agak. Yad ke kumnɨm tek lup ak, yad ke tepayaŋ tɨkjakɨnɨm tek lup ak agak. Takaw kɨles anɨb ak tek Bapi yɨp agup agak.
Jisas takaw anɨb ak agek, Juda kay nɨŋɨd tepayaŋ asɨk pɨs ak ke, pɨs ak ke lɨlak.
10.20 Jon 7.20, 8.48, 8.52 Pɨs ak keke lɨl, kuŋay agɨlak, Nop kɨcheki mulɨk sɨkek, sawl sek lek ageb agɨlak. Taynen takaw nop nɨgebɨm agɨlak?
10.21 Sng 94.9, 146.8, Jon 9.6-7, 9.32-33 Pen ogɨnap agɨlak, Nop kɨcheki mulɨk sɨkɨpɨkop, anɨgɨl ma apɨkop agɨlak. Pen kɨcheki mulɨk sɨkek, taydɨl binɨb wɨdɨn koy okok gek, tepayaŋ nepɨlap agɨlak.
Pen kɨdek Juda ñɨn awl olap apek, Juda binɨb Jelusalem apnan gɨlak. Kɨli ñɨn anɨb ak bɨlel God kal ne ak aglɨl agɨlak, God agnɨgep kal awl ak yenɨgab agɨlak. Anɨb ñɨn ak, yobup gɨl yɨgen gup ñɨn ak.
Pen Jisas ne God agnɨgep kal awl kab wali kus gɨl yek ak, Solomon kal bad ak agelɨgɨpal, mɨgan ak ajek.

10.24 Apo 3.11, 5.12, Luk 22.67 Ajaknɨŋ, Juda kay okok kɨli Jisas yek sɨŋak apɨl, bɨnɨg kuskus gɨl agɨlak, Ñɨn akal chɨnop takaw yɨpɨd gɨl agɨnɨgaban agɨlak? Nad Bɨ God nop aglup ak, binɨb okok kɨlop dɨl kod yenɨgab ak yenɨmɨn, mɨseŋ age nɨgɨnɨgun agɨlak.
Agel Jisas pen agak, Nɨbop agñɨbin ak pen, yɨp gos ma lɨnepɨm agak. Tap wog gɨpin ak, Bapi ne nokom agek gɨpin agak. Anɨb ak tek, wog anɨb ak ne ke nɨbop yomub, yad an yad nɨm mɨdebin ak agak.
10.26 Jon 6.64, 8.45-47, 1 Jo 4.6 Pen chag sipsip yad ak ma mɨdebɨm tek, yɨp gos ma lɨnepɨm agak.
10.27 Jon 8.47, 10.3-4, 10.14 Chag sipsip yad okok kɨlop nepin agak. Kɨli meg mɨgan yad ak nɨŋɨd, yɨp kɨdek gɨpal agak.
10.28 Jon 3.16, 6.37-39, 17.11-12, 18.9 Yad kɨlop gen pel pelnep yenɨgabal agak. Pɨsnep kul ma gɨnɨgel agak. Ñɨn adek yad mɨdebal ak, binɨb olap apɨl kɨlop tɨg asɨk dad amnɨmuŋ tek ma yenɨgab agak.

10.29 Jon 14.28, 17.2, 17.6 Bapi ne kɨlop dɨl yɨp ñub agak. Pen ne bɨ kɨles tɨmel yɨbɨl ak, bɨ olap kɨles ne mɨdeb tek ma mɨdeb. Mel yɨbɨl agak. Anɨb ak tek, ñɨn adek ne mɨdebal ak, binɨb olap apɨl kɨlop tɨg asɨk dad amnɨmuŋ tek ma mɨdeb agak.
10.30 Jon 17.11, 17.22 Bapi ke yad ke mel, chɨlapɨl bɨ nokom yɨbɨl agak.
Jisas anɨb agek, Juda kay nop tepayaŋ kab tɨgju paklɨnɨg gɨlak.
Gelak, Jisas pen agak, Bapi agek, wog teplep kuŋay gɨpin ak nepɨm agak. Pen gɨpin anɨb ak, adek akal taydɨl gen nɨŋɨd, yɨp kab tɨgju paklɨnɨg gebɨm agak?

Agek Juda kay pen agɨlak, Tap wog teplep olap gɨpan anɨb ak nɨŋɨd, nep kab tɨgju paklɨnɨg ma gobun agɨlak. God nop agjupan ak nɨm, nep kab tɨgju paklɨnɨg gobun agɨlak. Nad bɨ yokɨp mɨdeban ak pen, yad ke God mɨdebin agɨl gos nepan agɨlak.
Anɨb agelak, Jisas pen agak, Takaw Mosis ñu kɨl tɨkak pel nepɨm ak, God takaw olap tɨkɨl agak, Yad apin, Nɨbi god mɨdebɨm apin agɨl tɨkak agak.
10.35 Mat 5.18 Buk Baybol takaw olap kul ma gɨnɨgab ak nɨm, binɨb God takaw ne agñak okok kɨlop, nɨbi god mɨdebɨm agɨl tɨkak ak, nɨŋɨd agɨl tɨkak agak.

10.36 Jon 3.17, 5.17-18, 6.27, 9.35-37 Yad pen, Bapi yɨp aglɨl wog gɨnɨmɨn agɨl agyokek, lum awl ownek agak. Anɨb ak yad apin, God Ñɨne mɨdebin ak nep agen, nɨbi taynen God nop agjup agɨl apɨm ak agak.
Bapi wog ne ak ma genɨgayn, takaw yad ak gos ma nɨgɨnɨmɨb agak.
10.38 Jon 14.10-11 Pen genɨm, takaw yad apin ak gos ma nɨgenɨgabɨm, tap wog gɨpin ak nɨŋɨd gos nɨgɨnɨmɨb agak. Anɨgenɨgabɨm, yad Bapi ayɨp mɨdebin, Bapi ne yad ayɨp mɨdeb ak, nɨgtep gɨnɨgabɨm agak.
10.39 Luk 4.30, Jon 8.59 Anɨb agek, tepayaŋ nop dɨnɨg gelak ak, ne kɨmɨgel sɨlɨgɨl amnak.
Pen Jisas adɨkɨd amɨl, ñɨg Jodan tɨkɨl kɨd adaŋ amnak. Amɨl, Jon ned mɨdɨl binɨb kɨlop ñɨg pakñolɨgup man ak yolɨgup.
Pen binɨb kuŋay yɨbɨl ne yek ak apɨl agɨlak, Nɨŋɨd apun, Jon tap mageptek olap ma gak ak pen, bɨ nɨm awl nop agɨl takaw tɨtay agak ak, mɨdupsek nɨŋɨd yɨbɨl agolɨgup agɨlak.
10.42 Jon 7.31 Pen Jisas man anɨb ak yek, binɨb kuŋay yɨbɨl nop gos lɨnɨgɨlak.
